income_messages:
From: e**************3@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2022-08-10 23:00:14
SUBJECT:   Honorable
  Honorable
I am Engr. George Marks the Vice Chairman, Julius Berger Nigeria
Construction Company, I write you officially to know if you are
willing to sell your Contract / Inheritance information with the
Nigerian Government to us since you have not been able to receive your
fund.
We understand that your fund has already been declared paid to the
Federal Government of Nigeria by the Corrupt Bank/Government Officials
that handled your fund payment, and all this while you have been
fighting to receive your fund without knowing that the Corrupt
Bank/Government Officials that handled your fund payment diverted your
fund to a trading Company in London, and have been trading with your
fund on Stocks and Bonds without your knowledge and still frustrating
/ripping you off by making you pay bills to frustrate you.
We have very high understanding with the Nigerian Government and we
have connections with top financial governing bodies in Nigeria and
London.
We are making you an offer to sell your Contract/Inheritance
information to us, while we pay you directly through one of our
offshore banking accounts and go for the fund with the information
which you will give us.
I await your response.
Yours Sincerely.
Engr. George Marks.
Vice Chairman
Julius Berger Nigeria Construction Company.   
From: e**************3@gmail.com
To: mw66248@m**************p
Time: 2022-08-16 08:44:18
SUBJECT: RE: Offer To Purchase Your Contract/Inheritance Information With Nigeria Government
Dear Brian
Your mail are well received and the content noted. Please
understandbthat this is not scam, we are paying nothing less than 75%
of the contract amount if your contract information are correct and
mind you that you are not the first person whom have traded his or her
contract information successfully to us and they have received their
money
through our bank account in America.
Sequel to this, I will advise you to forward the information listed
below so that we will be sure that you are the one and then send your
other details with your Contract / Inheritance documents that is with
the Nigerian Government. Then if every thing is clear and verified by
them, Our Legal Department will prepare the legal papers for you to
sign once they have cross checked them from the Bureau of Public
Procurement and the Federal Ministry of Justice.
Please be informed that our legal department will need the following
information from you:-
Your full Names:
Contact address:
Contact Phone number:
Contract / Inheritance Number:
Contract / Inheritance Amount:
Yours Sincerely.
Engr. George Marks
Vice Chairman
Julius Berger Nigeria Construction Company.
outbound_messages:
From: mw66248@m**************p
To: e**************3@gmail.com
Time: 2022-08-10 23:00:19
SUBJECT: Re:   Honorable
I am happy to collaborate with you, but I want to know more about your plan and potential risks of course.
Best,
Brian
From: mw66248@m**************p
To: e**************3@gmail.com
Time: 2022-08-16 08:45:09
SUBJECT: Re: RE: Offer To Purchase Your Contract/Inheritance Information With Nigeria Government
That sounds like a opportunity. How long it takes to get my benefits?
Best,
Brian
